pullrequest.title: fix Link::AddTorque for Simbody and Bullet, with test

content.raw:
Thanks for the good explanation. 
Now that my understanding of the AddForce*/AddTorque methods semantics is clearer, I guess that It is possible to apply an arbitrary wrench by decomposing it in a pure force and torque on its Poinsot Axis. The obtained pure force and pure torque can then be applied to the link, with the force that is applied to a point belonging to the Poinsot Axis.
